section.heading: Scope.
section.text: The fee schedule applies to all acupuncturists who apply for licensure or license renewal and auricular detoxification specialists.

para.text: In this chapter, the following term has the meaning indicated.
Term Defined. "Board" means the State Board of Acupuncture.

section.heading: Fees.
section.text: The following fees are established by the Board:

para.text: Fine for failure to notify Board of change in name or address — $50;
Examination equivalency review plus all necessary travel, accommodations, and translation or other expenses — $250;
Application for certification to practice acupuncture on animals — $100;
